name: @graphdone/mcp-server
description: MCP server for GraphDone graph operations

scripts.dev: echo 'MCP server should be started by Claude Code, not npm run dev. Use npm run dev:mcp to start manually.'
scripts.test:chaos:all: npm run test:chaos:real && npm run test:chaos:multi && npm run test:chaos:distributed && npm run test:chaos:concurrency && npm run test:chaos:filesystem && npm run test:chaos:network && npm run test:chaos:performance && npm run test:chaos:resources
scripts.ci:full: npm run lint && npm run typecheck && npm run test && npm run test:chaos:all
scripts.ci:security: npm run test:chaos:multi && npm run test:chaos:network && npm run test:chaos:resources
scripts.ci:performance: npm run test:chaos:performance && npm run test:chaos:concurrency && npm run test:chaos:distributed
